p: As writing in the previous sentence: “inside the classrooms”. But we also precised why : “raps were set up during 24 hours inside classrooms with 1 trap per classroom. Following the traditional Cambodian construction, all classes of all schools have openings in the tops of each wall to let the air circulates and reduce the high temperatures occurring during the daytime, allowing the free circulation of mosquitoes.” (LINES 95-99)
